focusedlayout.condition: [Container.Content(movies) + !String.StartsWith(Container.PluginName,plugin.video.the-loop)] | Container.Content(sets) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(musicvideos) | Container.Content(games) | Window.IsActive(videoplaylist) | Window.IsActive(musicplaylist)

itemlayout.condition: [Container.Content(movies) + !String.StartsWith(Container.PluginName,plugin.video.the-loop)] | Container.Content(sets) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(musicvideos) | Container.Content(games) | Window.IsActive(videoplaylist) | Window.IsActive(musicplaylist)
